channel.title: My slayer master dialogue
channel.description: when i talk to slayer master its show all dialogue but when i click on " yes, i would like to get a task and after when i click on that dialogue its show nothing but close the dialogue then its say on the chat box i want that to show in the dialogue

item.title: My slayer master dialogue
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Some code would be appreciated…
I(Or we, being everyone) need to see your dialogue handler (the dialogues used), your clicking buttons (for the dialogue ID’s and such) and your slayer class (to see how it gives tasks).
